channel.title: My first Sig! (10 min. sig)
channel.description:
Ok well this is my first sig... I have about 4 versions of it.. I made all of them in 10 min. total. Please tell me how I did :P. (I did not use any tutorials)
[IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m187/xspikeyhairx/Untitled-2copy.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m187/xspikeyhairx/flyingsigwtrans.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m187/xspikeyhairx/flyingwborder.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i104.photobucket.com/albums/m187/xspikeyhairx/flyingsig.jpg[/img]
Please tell me anything I can improve on. And remember its my frist sig, so pelase be nice :P

item.title: My first Sig! (10 min. sig)
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

Don’t play the 10 minute card.

Thats like black people saying they got fired because of their skin color.
We all know its bullshit, and an epic fail.

Even if you did spend only 10 minutes on it, I would slap you on the wrists for not spending enough time.

Read full topic

item.title: My first Sig! (10 min. sig)
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Colors are hot, tbh. The girl, not so much. Even if you did spend 10 minutes on it, 3/10.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Spikey_Hair Spikey Hair
item.description:

Well it is all mine. I did it all by myself. I dont like leechers anyways. And what do you mean, what stock?
[/quote]

What was the original image before you added some filters/brushes/backgrounds?[/quote]
I got from plannet renders… Here it is:

item.title: My first Sig! (10 min. sig)
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Spikey Hair:

Well it is all mine. I did it all by myself. I dont like leechers anyways. And what do you mean, what stock?

What was the original image before you added some filters/brushes/backgrounds?

item.title: My first Sig! (10 min. sig)
item.dc:creator: @Spikey_Hair Spikey Hair
item.description:
@Spikey_Hair wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:10, topic:172927”][quote author=Spikey Hair link=topic=233141.msg1993785#msg1993785 date=1200216106]
Well everything that you said you highly doubt is true. It did only take me 10 min, I didn’t use a tut, and yes it is my first sig. I have worked with photshop for a few other things though, but never a sig.
[/quote]

What stock did you use?

And you see, the reason I am skeptical is because there have been numerous cases of people ripping sigs and passing it off on their own. Being a junior member doesn’t help much either.[/quote]
Well it is all mine. I did it all by myself. I dont like leechers anyways. And what do you mean, what stock?

Read full topic

item.title: My first Sig! (10 min. sig)
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Spikey Hair:

Well everything that you said you highly doubt is true. It did only take me 10 min, I didn’t use a tut, and yes it is my first sig. I have worked with photshop for a few other things though, but never a sig.

What stock did you use?

And you see, the reason I am skeptical is because there have been numerous cases of people ripping sigs and passing it off on their own. Being a junior member doesn’t help much either.

Read full topic

item.title: My first Sig! (10 min. sig)
item.dc:creator: @Spikey_Hair Spikey Hair
item.description:
@Spikey_Hair wrote:

xxlegitxx:

It’s nothing personal. Any sig that takes 10 mins is at most a 0. Assuming it is true that it is your first sig (which I highly doubt) and you used no tutorials (which I highly doubt) and you spent 10 minutes (which I highly doubt), then you get a 0.

Well everything that you said you highly doubt is true. It did only take me 10 min, I didn’t use a tut, and yes it is my first sig. I have worked with photshop for a few other things though, but never a sig.

Read full topic
